Address.label: Address
Address.value: 60 CUTTER MILL ROAD,SUITE 205, GREAT NECK, New York, 11021, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Manhattan Bridge Capital Inc is a real estate finance company taxed as a REIT that specializes in originating, servicing and managing a portfolio of first mortgage loans. The company offer short-term, secured, non-banking loans which may renew or extend on, before or after their initial term expires, to real estate investors to fund their acquisition, renovation, rehabilitation or development of residential or commercial properties located in the New York metropolitan area, including New Jersey and Connecticut, and in Florida.
